Networks.Name: Flow (Raindrop) Path
Networks.Description: Trace flow path of a specified point through the network.

Networks.Name: Network Path
Networks.Description: Trace relations between 2 specified points through the network.

Networks.Name: Network Trace
Networks.Description: Upstream or downstream network trace to identify available data selections, such as gages, dams, and/or water quality sites, etc.

featureid.description: NHD plus feature id. Also known as catchment id or COMID.

x.description: x location in deximal degrees WGS 84 coordinate system.

y.description: Configuration options produced from navigation resource request. Must be populated and resubmitted within requesting body.

CodeOrID.description: Unique resource code or identifier, used for identifying unique resource.

options.Description: Configuration options produced from navigation resource request. Must be populated and resubmitted within requesting body.

properties.description: Flag indicator to add NHDplus attributes to features
